text: Hingstepeira is a genus of South American orb-weaver spiders first described by Herbert Walter Levi in 1995. ==Species== it contains four species: *Hingstepeira arnolisei Levi, 1995 – Brazil *Hingstepeira dimona Levi, 1995 – Brazil *Hingstepeira folisecens (Hingston, 1932) – Colombia, Brazil, Guyana, Suriname, French Guiana *Hingstepeira isherton Levi, 1995 – Guyana ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of South America
title: Hingstepeira
